postBodyContent: It’s just IMPOSSIBLE that Malfoy does not get up every morning thinking ‘now, where should I go today, which part of the castle should I lurk in, to get in Potter’s way and comment everything he does ? Maybe today I should climb on a tree and dramatically jump when he passes by’ like yeah maybe he even has his own kind of map with only Harry’s name on it MAYBE HE HAS A CLOCK LIKE MOLLY WEASLEY maybe he just has a weird sense of anticipation to where Harry will be
I fear nothing, all is as the force wills it.

AU where instead of accepting Lilah’s offer and working for Wolfram & Hart, Angel and the others decide to go work for the Slayer organization instead and it works so !!! well !!! bc Wes can learn from his mistakes and he becomes a much better watcher than his father ever was and the girls love him and appreciate him and Gunn takes over the L.A squad and everyone knows his team is a) the most badass and b) the coolest to be in bc there are weekly action movie marathons and gaming competitions and they’re always doing social work and feeling great about themselves and Fred joins Willow and they run the Science && Magick divisions together and become such a great team (( and couple )) and make awesome advances in both fields that really help make the world a better place and figure out how to fix Cordy who goes back to her old pre S03E22 self and creates a PR division with Lorne and they figure out how to make the people actually like Slayers and make honest money and they all become a big loving family and Angel’s so happy that everything’s working out and that Buffy and Cordy are both okay that he probably just becomes Angelus again tbh
I have never in my life been afraid of Darth Vader but that one scene in Rogue One had me SHOOK
Be careful not to choke on your aspirations, Director.
also maybe:
